name: authapp
description: - Create an endpoint that issues a jwt token.  - Create 2nd endpoint that blacklists this token. - Create 3rd endpoint to show session history of the user. - And a middleware for accessing rest of the endpoints. (Rest of the endpoints can be just normal Hello-world stuff, not important, just for testing) - The login endpoint can accept username/password or a google token (access-token, id-token, one-time-code). Depending upon where it is coming from it verifies the user and issues token.
author: akshay
